item.title: A Step to Step Guide to Elm Signal
item.description: When I first start to learn Elm, I failed to understand Elm Signal. Luckily there is a start-app which wrap up Signal so that I don’t have to understant it to start playing with Elm. However, I like to understand how the tool I use work so I decided to spend time on it. From the Elm documentation, A signal is a value that changes over time In Elm, anything that changes over time can be Signal including time itself(chill, will explain later).
